title: Kyber
description: By using Kyber, claim adjusters save more than 25% of their time, allowing them to focus on more critical tasks and things they enjoy working on. Besides making it more fulfilling for your adjusting team, the efficiency gains save both money and time that is better spent on more business critical tasks. Kyber is feature rich and easy to install and can be made available to your adjustor team in days, ensuring a quick and seamless transition to a more efficient claims notification process.
